title: Admin panel: view full quote form message text

requirements.summary: Keep Quote Forms table compact while adding a clear interaction to open a scrollable full-message view that preserves line breaks, without affecting ticket status actions.
acceptanceCriteria: In Quote Forms (frontend/src/components/AdminQuoteFormsSection.tsx), the message preview in the table is no longer the only way to access the content (currently truncated via `line-clamp-2`).
For any ticket with a long `ticket.formData.message`, an admin can open a full-message view and read the entire text.
The full-message view displays the exact message content, including new lines/paragraphs (no loss of whitespace meaning), and supports scrolling for very long messages.
The existing "Mark Complete / Mark Pending" action continues to work as before, and the new message viewing interaction does not interfere with it.

file_operations.description: Create a small, composed (non-shadcn-ui-folder) modal/dialog component that renders the selected ticket message with preserved whitespace/line breaks and an internal scroll region for long content; include close interactions (e.g., close button + overlay click + Esc).

Add state to track the currently selected ticket/message, keep the table message cell compact (can remain line-clamped) but add an explicit "View full" interaction (button/link and/or clickable message cell) that opens FullTicketMessageModal; ensure the new interaction does not conflict with the existing Mark Complete/Mark Pending button behavior and click targets.
